turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hi there. How are you today?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Hello, I am fine, how about you?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Very well thanks. Do you currently give any money to charity on a regular basis?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, I try to help time to time

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Any charity in particular?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: No, anything that catches my eyes, or I find them on gofundme, what about you?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I have a few payments set up monthly. I assume then you've heard of Save the Children and the great work they do with young people?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, I've heard of it. Can you please explain more about it?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Firstly, they provide funds and support services to help protect vulnerable children all over the world. Once the children have a safe environment the next priority is to improve their lives via education and other resources. They really make a difference to the lives of children in poverty or destitution.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I am interested in it. I already checked their website. Health and education both are important factors

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Absolutely. And the great thing for us is that even a very small donation goes a long way due to the number of people who can donate! We're asking people today to give a small part of the payment for this HIT to the charity. You'll get a box pop up at teh end of our chat which will give you the opportunity to donate something. Obviously the more the better, but I also appreciate that you aren't turking for free so you can judge it yourself.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Actually I like these kind of HITs. I did few HITs before that asked me to donate my bonus or half of the reward. I happily did. I am sure there are people who need it more than me

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: You're absolutely right-  sometimes we don't realise it, but what seems like a little bit of moeny to us can make a big difference to them. I worked in Africa earlier this year and the difference a few dollars can make to people over there is unbelievable.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, few dollars can save a child or can help a family to survive for a month. How long have you worked there?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I'm back in the UK now - I was in South Africa (Durban) for three months from January to end of March for work.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That is so nice of you. It is a big thing to do. Thinking about starving children makes me so sad. I wish I could do more

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: We can all do something - donate a little bit or volunteer to try to help. There are lots of opportunities

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes you are right, I help as much as I can. at least I try. "save the children" sounds like an amazing organization. They work in 120 countries already

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: They certainly do and tehy are well established so you cna be certain they are going to use the money in a good way.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes It looks like a trustworthy organization with no doubt. I already read few of their reports on their website. I wish they can help even more countries

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Me too. When we click done that donation box will appear - it should be pretty self-explanatory. I hope you enjoy the rest of your day. Thanks again.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Thank you, I will do it for sure, have a nice day
